bug.author: shane-huang
bug.summary: unit tests needs to check return results for predict and evaluate
bug.description: For example, we need to check the return result for model.evaluate <denchmark-link:https://github.com/intel-analytics/analytics-zoo/blob/master/pyzoo/test/zoo/zouwu/test_model_forecast.py#L137>https://github.com/intel-analytics/analytics-zoo/blob/master/pyzoo/test/zoo/zouwu/test_model_forecast.py#L137</denchmark-link> at least check it is not None.
